name: com.pz.studio
description:
Highrise Studio

Highrise Studio is a Unity package specifically designed for crafting and managing Highrise games directly within the Unity Editor. This package integrates the full spectrum of Highrise game development tools into Unity's versatile platform. Aimed at leveraging Unity's advanced development capabilities, it offers a unified and powerful environment for creating Highrise experiences and worlds.

Core Features:

 ▪ Integrated Highrise World Building: Utilize Unity's robust environment to design, build, and preview Highrise worlds. This feature integrates Highrise's unique gameplay elements and physics directly into Unity, providing a seamless game development experience.
 ▪ Lua Scripting Engine: Embedded Lua scripting functionality allows for direct coding of game logic and behaviors within the Unity interface. This integration includes complete support for the Highrise Studio API, enabling developers to script interactions, game mechanics, and more with efficiency and ease.
 ▪ Asset Management and Export: A streamlined asset pipeline that facilitates the creation, management, and export of Highrise-compatible assets from within Unity. This includes 3D models, animations, sounds, and textures, optimized for use in Highrise games.
 ▪ Comprehensive Learning Resources: Access to a wide array of tutorials, documentation, and community forums dedicated to Highrise game development in Unity. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, these resources are designed to accelerate your learning curve and inspire innovation.

Target Audience:

 ▪ Game Developers: Ideal for Unity developers looking to explore the vibrant Highrise platform, as well as Highrise creators seeking to leverage Unity's advanced development tools.
 ▪ Educators and Students: An excellent resource for teaching and learning game development, combining Highrise's accessibility with Unity's professional-grade tools.
 ▪ Indie Studios: Small teams can benefit from the integrated development environment to prototype and publish games on Highrise, taking advantage of Unity's powerful features to bring their visions to life.

The Highrise Studio for Unity opens up new possibilities for game creation, offering a comprehensive set of tools that redefine what's possible on the Highrise platform. Start building your dream Highrise game in Unity today and tap into the potential of this dynamic game development ecosystem.
